amendatorysection.catchline: Department of Economic Development; Industrial Recruitment.
amendatorysection.para: AGENCY NO. 72 — DEPARTMENT OF ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT
The unexpended Cash Fund appropriation balance existing on June 30, 2007, is hereby reappropriated.

There is included in the appropriation to this program for FY2007-08 $377,500 General Funds, $6,357,944 Cash Funds, and $249,341 Federal Funds estimate for state aid, which shall only be used for such purpose. There is included in the appropriation to this program for FY2008-09 $277,500 General Funds, $6,357,944 Cash Funds, and $249,341 Federal Funds estimate for state aid, which shall only be used for such purpose.

source.note: The Revisor of Statutes has pursuant to section 49-769 correlated LB 959, section 87, with LB 960, section 188, to reflect all amendments.
